Elsir Hammer Champion [Greater Style]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Fighter, Elsir Hammer Student feat
Benefit: When you are wielding a one-handed hammer or a one-handed pick and you have proficiency with that weapon, you can shift 1 square as an immediate reaction whenever an adjacent enemy that is marked by you or your ally shifts away from you.
When you are attacking with a one-handed hammer or a one-handed pick and you have proficiency with that weapon, you can target the enemyâ€™s Reflex instead of AC when you use a power associated with this feat.


Associated Powers: Blood Rush, Boggling Smash, Crushing Blow, Iron Bulwark, Paralyzing Strike, Talon of the Roc

Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 115.
